title: How to increase my analytical writing score from 4 to 5 in gre - Quora
tags: Graduate School Admission Tests and Exams

response.answer_text: Getting 5 in AWA is so challenging , but  not impossible. Just go through ETS ,and Manhattan 7-8 books, along with Magoosh AWA videos. Hope you can get enough idea to get 5 in AWA. If you have enough time ,then download ,On writing well books by William Zinsser.Very good one for writing.
